text: Sargodha District () is a district in the Punjab province of Pakistan. The city of Sargodha is the capital. ==Tehsils== * Bhalwal Tehsil * Sahiwal Tehsil * Sargodha Tehsil * Shahpur Tehsil * Sillanwali Tehsil * Kot Momin Tehsil Category:Districts of British India Category:Sargodha Division
title: Sargodha District
